raw:
{
  "requirement_id": "req-001",
  "requirement_summary": "Travel insurance for a trip from Singapore to Japan covering medical emergencies, trip cancellations, lost luggage, travel delays, and skiing activities.",
  "detailed_description": "Customer is requesting travel insurance for two adults, age group 26-40, traveling from Singapore to Japan for a duration of 10 days. The insurance must cover emergency medical treatment, trip cancellation due to illness or family emergencies, reimbursement for lost or damaged luggage, coverage for travel delays including additional accommodation and meals, and activities specifically for skiing.",
  "travel_origin": "Singapore",
  "travel_destination": "Japan",
  "travel_duration": "10 days",
  "insurance_coverage_type": [
    "Emergency Medical Coverage",
    "Trip Cancellation",
    "Lost/Damaged Luggage",
    "Travel Delays",
    "Sports and Adventure Activities"
  ],
  "pre_existing_conditions": [],
  "medical_needs": [],
  "activities_to_cover": [
    "Skiing"
  ],
  "age_group": "26-40",
  "additional_requests": "Budget of $200-$300 for the insurance premium.",
  "keywords": [
    "travel insurance",
    "emergency medical treatment",
    "trip cancellation",
    "lost luggage",
    "travel delays",
    "skiing"
  ]
}

json_dict.requirement_summary: Travel insurance for a trip from Singapore to Japan covering medical emergencies, trip cancellations, lost luggage, travel delays, and skiing activities.
json_dict.detailed_description: Customer is requesting travel insurance for two adults, age group 26-40, traveling from Singapore to Japan for a duration of 10 days. The insurance must cover emergency medical treatment, trip cancellation due to illness or family emergencies, reimbursement for lost or damaged luggage, coverage for travel delays including additional accommodation and meals, and activities specifically for skiing.
json_dict.additional_requests: Budget of $200-$300 for the insurance premium.

tasks_output.description:
Analyze the travel insurance call transcript below and extract key customer requirements.
Step 1: Read the transcript carefully and extract all relevant details. For each field in the schema, provide a brief annotation or reference to the specific portion(s) of the transcript where the detail was found.
Step 2: Review your annotations to verify that every extracted detail directly matches the transcript. Resolve any discrepancies or conflicts in the data.
Step 3: Produce a final, validated JSON object that adheres exactly to the TravelInsuranceRequirement schema

If a field is not mentioned in the transcript, use null.

Transcript:
Customer Service Agent: Good morning, thank you for calling ISS Insurance Ltd. My name is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Customer: Hi Sarah, look, I'm really short on time. I need to get travel insurance sorted quickly. Can we just get straight to it?
Customer Service Agent: Of course, sir. I understand you're busy. To help you efficiently, I just need a few details about your trip first. Where will you be travelling from Singapore?
Customer: Singapore, yes. We're planning a trip to Japan.
Customer Service Agent: Okay, Japan. And how long will you be away for?
Customer: It will be a 10 days trip. Get that down?
Customer Service Agent: Got it, 10 days. And how many people will be travelling?
Customer: Just two of us.
Customer Service Agent: Alright, two travellers. And roughly what age group are the travellers in?
Customer: We're mostly around 26-40 years old. Okay, is that enough? What about the actual insurance?
Customer Service Agent: Almost there, sir. Just a couple more things to understand your needs. Thinking about the trip, are there any specific concerns regarding potential health issues or needing medical attention while you're in Japan?
Customer: Well, obviously, if one of us gets sick or has an accident, we need Emergency medical treatment covered. Hospital stays, doctor visits, that sort of thing. Standard stuff, right?
Customer Service Agent: Understood, coverage for emergency medical needs. And what about anything happening *before* the trip that might force you to cancel? For instance, if someone falls ill?
Customer: Yeah, definitely need that. What if we have to cancel because of illness or some family emergency? Trip Cancellation is important, yes. Can't lose all that money.
Customer Service Agent: Okay, noted trip cancellation cover. And regarding your belongings during transit?
Customer: Look, if the airline loses my bag or damages it, I expect some Reimbursement for lost items. And maybe for essential purchases if it's delayed for ages. So yes, Lost/Damaged Luggage cover. Quickly now.
Customer Service Agent: Right, Lost/Damaged Luggage. How about potential disruptions *during* your travels, like flight delays causing extra expenses?
Customer: Yes, yes! If the flight gets delayed badly, need cover for Accommodation expenses, meals, that kind of thing. Travel Delays, put that down.
Customer Service Agent: Okay, Travel Delays coverage noted. Are you planning any specific activities during your trip to Japan? Maybe any sports or adventure-type activities?
Customer: Ah yes, good point. We plan to do Skiing during our trip. Need to make sure that's covered if anything happens on the slopes.
Customer Service Agent: Okay, Skiing cover specifically under Sports and Adventure Activities. Thatâ€™s important to note. And does either traveller have any pre-existing medical conditions, like asthma or diabetes, for example? Or require any special medical equipment?
Customer: No, no pre-existing conditions. And No special medical equipment needed. Just standard health.
Customer Service Agent: Great, thank you. And one last thing, do you have a particular budget in mind for the insurance premium?
Customer: Yes, trying to keep it reasonable. We're hoping to spend $200-$300 if possible. Can you find something in that range?
Customer Service Agent: Okay, so just to confirm, you're looking for travel insurance for two adults, age group 26-40, travelling from Singapore to Japan for 10 days. You require coverage for Medical Coverage (Emergency), Trip Cancellation, Lost/Damaged Luggage, Travel Delays, and specifically coverage for Sports and Adventure Activities including Skiing. No pre-existing conditions or special medical needs declared, and you have a budget preference of around $200-$300. Is that all correct, sir?
Customer: Yes, that's everything. Finally. Got it all?
Customer Service Agent: Yes, sir, I have all the details needed. Thank you for providing that information. We will use this to identify suitable options for you.
Customer: Okay good. That's all I have time for now. Bye.
Customer Service Agent: Thank you for calling ISS Insurance. Have a good day.
tasks_output.expected_output: A JSON object that matches the TravelInsuranceRequirement model.
tasks_output.summary: Analyze the travel insurance call transcript below and extract key...
